clinical_history: Patient with thyroid nodule under assessment.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in soft tissue of thigh with SUVmax 14.27.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
